overview: The beautiful Anna Polina calls on her friend and director of a theater, Ricky Mancini to put on a play. She finds herself on stage with Tiffany and Doryann while the director takes care of Victoria Beauregard, the costume designer, in his dressing room. As the rehearsals progress, the atmosphere will turn out to be very naughty between the members of the troop.
title: Anikka Vs. Penny
